mapper.select: SELECT mk_seq, mb_id, mk_title, mk_content, mk_create_at, mk_update_at FROM jsp.market order by mk_update_at desc
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO jsp.market_files ( mk_seq, mb_id, up_original_file_name, up_new_file_name, up_file_path, up_file_size ) VALUES ( #{mkSeq}, #{mbId}, #{upOriginalFileName}, #{upNewFileName}, #{upFilePath}, #{upFileSize} )
mapper.update: UPDATE jsp.market SET mk_seq=#{mkSeq}, mb_id=#{mbId}, mk_title=#{mkTitle}, mk_content=#{mkContent}, mk_update_at=now() WHERE mk_seq=#{mkSeq}
